      • readRawVarint32

        private static int readRawVarint32(org.apache.hbase.thirdparty.io.netty.buffer.ByteBuf buffer)
        Reads variable length 32bit int from buffer This method is from ProtobufVarint32FrameDecoder in Netty and modified a little bit to pass the cyeckstyle rule.
        Returns:
        decoded int if buffers readerIndex has been forwarded else nonsense value
